rules_text:
When you cast Yune, Goddess of Chaos, each player chooses X permanents they own. Starting with you, for each permanent chosen this way, they exile the top card of their library until they exile a card with the same type. An opponent of their choice puts the exiled card onto the battlefield under their control. Put any exiled card not put onto a battlefield this way on the bottom of its owner's library.
[i]Goddess of Chaos[/i] – Yune's power and toughness is equal to the number of permanents players control but don't own.
